name: pay-day
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user's level in extra money for each time this move was used.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Throws coins. Gets
them back later.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Throws coins. Gets
them back later.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:

Money is recovered after.
